voyaggi.text1: Voyaggi is a travel planner that uses artificial intelligence to recommend different destinations and activities in the city users want to visit, along with an approximate cost.
voyaggi.text2: In addition to that, users can adjust various details such as hotels, transportation, preferences, tours, and much more. It offers an interactive interface that allows users to reorder activities as they wish and much more.

tasteNest.text1: Conceptual web design project for a restaurant, focused on visual experience and navigation structure.
tasteNest.text2: The proposal features sections such as Home, Menu, and About, with an emphasis on layout, typography, and visual hierarchy. The project is purely demonstrative and does not include real functionality.

automatizacion.title: Automation
automatizacion.description: I automate processes so your business saves time and reduces errors.
automatizacion.item1: Less manual work and more efficiency
automatizacion.item2: Clear processes that run on their own
automatizacion.item3: More time to focus on selling and growing

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: I design websites that not only look great, but communicate trust and turn visitors into customers.
webDesign.item1: Design aligned with your brand and goals
webDesign.item3: Built to capture, convince, and convert

backendWeb.title: Backend Web
backendWeb.description: I develop the internal side of your application so it runs fast and stays secure.
backendWeb.item3: Fewer technical issues, more peace of mind

items.description1: I hold a degree in Software Engineering from the University of Cartagena. My academic background provided a strong foundation in programming, system design, and problem-solving.
items.description2: I’ve refined my skills through online courses, self-driven projects, and hands-on experimentation. Each challenge has helped me grow as both a developer and a thinker.
items.description3: I completed internships at a couple of companies. I’ve also built and contributed to several independent projects that strengthened my and teamwork abilities.

figma.description: I use Figma to design clear and functional interfaces, creating prototypes that make decision-making easier before development begins.

gitHub.description: I manage version control for projects with GitHub, keeping the code organized, secure, and easy to scale.

n8n.description: I automate workflows and repetitive tasks with n8n to save time and improve day-to-day efficiency.
